plot: The sequel to Alien Dawn: Dawn of Destruction, follows the plight of the resistance as the fight against the scourge of the Martians. based on H.G. Wells' The War of the World.
title: Dawn of Destruction
plot_es: The sequel to Alien Dawn: Dawn of Destruction, follows the plight of the resistance as the fight against the scourge of the Martians. based on H.G. Wells' The War of the World.
plot_en: The sequel to Alien Dawn: Dawn of Destruction, follows the plight of the resistance as the fight against the scourge of the Martians. based on H.G. Wells' The War of the World.
